summary:
STANDALONE SpellSword Class follower inspired on the oriental model Xia Xiao Wei made by saifssj6 request. Perks added according to her Combat Style and Class. She is marriageable.
Level cap 100 (going with player). You can find her at Riverwood in the local Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/21419-1-1411580210.jpg[/img]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--She is NOW completely STANDALONE--
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SpellSword Class follower inspired on the oriental model Xia Xiao Wei made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2878004]saifssj6[/url] request.
Perks added according to her Combat Style and Class. She is marriageable.
Level cap 100 (going with player). You can find her at Riverwood in the local Inn.
She was made to work as a support follower. She is Heavy Armor specialized, dual wield, destruction (for cloak of flames),
and powerful healing (she doesn't heal enemies).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DestructionMaster
AugmentedFlames
IntenseFlames
Restoration Master
wardAbsorb
AvoidDeath
Armsman
HackAndSlash
FightingStance
SavageStrike
CriticalCharge
ParalyzingStrike
Bladesman
DualFlurry
DualSavagery
Juggernaut
TowerOfStrength, and much more!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Feel free to report issues. Go get her and have fun!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiHair[/url] by Apachii.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] (UNP BASE Main body) by dimon99.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]univision Face[/url] by DD AKT.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] by tktk (overwriting Univision files in NO Standalone Version).
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3650229]m0ckin9bird[/url] for her [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19726]Khaleesi Dragon Tattoos CBBE and UNP body[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3962945]Agito69[/url] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17093]Simply Army and Tattoos[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4584]CBBE Dovahkiin Edition - Bikini Underwear[/url] (in underwear optional file) by LoverBR.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
